newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU sets extra "B" sugar output levy.
newsitem.headline: EU sets extra "B" sugar output levy.

text.p: An extra production levy for "B" quota sugar was agreed by the European Union's sugar management committee to help finance subsidised exports of surpluses, EU sources said.
The committee, at its weekly meeting on Wednesday, increased the "B" levy by a maximum allowable 7.5 percent to 39.5 percent of the minimum price for beet sugar.
The minimum prices are as follows (Ecus a tonne):
"B" quota beet sugar - 28.84 (39.5 percent levy) --Brussels Bureau +322 287 6830
